name: Midway Arcade Treasures: Extended Play
overview: This PSP exclusive edition of Midway Arcade Treasures brings together a number of titles previously seen in the series, now for the first time in portable form. Titles include: • 720 • Arch Rivals • Championship Sprint • Cyberball 2072 • Defender • Gauntlet • Joust • Klax • Mortal Kombat • Marble Madness • Mortal Kombat II • Mortal Kombat 3 • Paperboy • Rampage • Rampart • Sinistar • Spy Hunter • Toobin • Wizard of Wor • Xenophobe • Xybots
